tit.cmt: カッコ部分を補いました。

sen.j: 真蛇（しんじゃ）とは能面の一種。
sen.e: Shinja is a kind of Nohmen (Noh mask).
Shinja is a kind of Nohmen (Noh mask).
Shinja is a kind of Nohmen (Noh mask).

sen.j: 「般若の面（はんにゃ）」と呼ばれる女の鬼の面の中でも、もっとも罪業深く、ほとんどヘビになってしまった面を真蛇（しんじゃ）と呼ぶ。
sen.e: Among female demon masks called "Hanya (female demon) masks", the one almost became a snake with the worst karma is called Shinja.
Among female demon masks called "Hanya [female demon] masks," the one which almost became a snake with the worst karma is called Shinja.
sen.cmt: 引用符内のカッコを修正しました。which を補いました。カンマの位置を修正しました。
sen.e: Among female demon masks called "Hanya [female demon] masks," the one which almost became a snake with the worst karma is called Shinja.

sen.j: 嫉妬のあまり、顔がほとんど蛇と化し、耳は取れ、口は耳まで裂け、舌が覗き、牙も長く、髪もほとんどなくなるとされている。
sen.e: It is said that a face almost turned to that of a snake due to excessive jealousy, consequently the ears removed, the mouth stretched from ear to ear, the tongue was visible, the fangs were long, and hair was almost lost.

It is said that the face almost turned to that of a snake due to excessive jealousy, consequently the ears removed, the mouth stretched from ear to ear, the tongue showing, the fangs are long, and the hair is almost lost.
sen.cmt: a→the,was visible→showing,were→are,was→is と修正し、the を挿入しました。
sen.e: It is said that the face almost turned to that of a snake due to excessive jealousy, consequently the ears removed, the mouth stretched from ear to ear, the tongue showing, the fangs are long, and the hair is almost lost.

sen.j: なお、角の生えているものはすべて女性の鬼で、男性には生えない。
sen.e: Moreover, only the female demons have the horns, but not male ones.
Moreover, only female demons have horns, but not male ones.
